title: Espresso Bar - Yehuda Maccabee
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Juice bar, Israeli, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. In the midst of a little Tel Aviv street with other cafes and shops, this cafe offers a separate vegan menu with choice in all categories, including a big Israeli-style breakfast, sandwiches like a grilled vegan mozzarella cheese, salads, and mains. Staff know what vegan means. Casual atmosphere.
